column1: Reasons why increasing the cost is required
2. Didn’t know the cloud architecture better
3. Sudden increase of data and user flux
Changes made to increase the price
Most of the price involves is in processing and transferring of data.
Here processing part is not that much but transferring in requests is too much.

If user flux has increased or the traffic has increases, in either cases, there will be more data generation, more processing and more transfer of data. So, to keep that in mind I have increases the resources of AWS Lambda (Processing), AWS DynamoDB(Caching), AWS CloudFront(Transferring of Data) and AWS S3(Storage of Data)
